caption.p: Annual cycles of piControl and NCEP reanalysis long‐term averages. The values shown are area‐weighted averages for grid points in the region 40° to 60°N and 30° to 120°E for the multimodel mean. The NCEP values are plotted in gray for each variable. The uncertainties shown extend to plus or minus two standard errors of the mean, based on the interannual variability of the individual grid point values.
